taxonomicnotes: Mastacembelus armatus is probably a species complex and further taxonomic work is required to clarify the taxonomy.
rationale: A widespread species with no known major widespread threats, Mastacembelus armatus is assessed as Least Concern.
assessor: Rayamajhi, A., Jha, B.R. & Sharma, C.M.
evaluator: Allen, D.J., Britz, R. & Vishwanath, W.
